org.chathamrobotics.ftcutils

Class AutonomousOpMode<ROBOT_TYPE extends Robot>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qualcomm.robotcore.eventloop.opmode.OpMode
      • com.qualcomm.robotcore.eventloop.opmode.LinearOpMode
        • org.chathamrobotics.ftcutils.AutonomousOpMode<ROBOT_TYPE>
  • Type Parameters:
    ROBOT_TYPE - The robot class to use as the type of the robot property

    public abstract class AutonomousOpMode<ROBOT_TYPE extends Robot>
extends com.qualcomm.robotcore.eventloop.opmode.LinearOpMode
    AutonomousOpMode provides utilities for working with Autonomous opmodes. These utilities include instantiating and storing a robot class, handling stopping and waiting for stop. The purpose of this class is allow the developer to focus on the autonomous procedure, and to not have to worry about the setup.

    Here is an example of how one might implement AutonomousOpMode 

         public class AutoOpMode extends AutonomousOpMode {
         public AutoOpMode(boolean isRedTeam) {
             super(isRedTeam, Robot9853.class);
         }

          @Override
         public void runRobot() throws StoppedException, InterruptedException {
             this.robot.doSomething();
         }
     }
